Cite

If you use SeisFlows for your work, please cite: Modrak et al. (2018)

Note

Modrak, R. T., Borisov, D., Lefebvre, M., & Tromp, J. (2018). SeisFlows — Flexible waveform inversion software. Computers & geosciences, 115, 88-95.

Publications which have used (and cited) SeisFlows (and SeisFlows3) can be found on Google Scholar.
